title: Early American Costume (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
Early American Costume
Stackpole Books | 1975 | ISBN: 0811705390 | English | 190 pages | PDF | 31 MB

Covers 1580 to 1850. Line drawings reminiscent of the Wilcox books cover good range of male, female, children and occupations/status. Especially useful are the sections on construction showing pattern modification to achieve period look; making simple period bonnets & hats; collars, kerchief & shawl arrangements
